languages.text: Разбитое оружие явно играет значимую роль в будущем, предначертанным Ткачом Судеб. Расстаться с любым из осколков будет означать потерять доверие покровителя.

The shattered weapon clearly has a significant role to play in the future preordained by the Weaver of Destinies. To part with any of the shards would mean losing the trust of the Rogue Trader's patron.
languages.original_text: Разбитое оружие явно играет значимую роль в будущем, предначертанным Ткачом Судеб. Расстаться с любым из осколков будет означать потерять доверие покровителя.

traits.locale_text: The shattered weapon clearly has a significant role to play in the future preordained by the Weaver of Destinies. To part with any of the shards would mean losing the trust of your patron.
The shattered weapon clearly has a significant role to play in the future preordained by the Weaver of Destinies. To part with any of the shards would mean losing the trust of your patron.
The shattered weapon clearly has a significant role to play in the future preordained by the Weaver of Destinies. To part with any of the shards would mean losing the trust of your patron.
The shattered weapon clearly has a significant role to play in the future preordained by the Weaver of Destinies. To part with any of the shards would mean losing the trust of your patron.

languages.text: Die geborstene Waffe spielt in der vom Weber der Schicksale vorherbestimmten Zukunft eindeutig eine bedeutende Rolle. Trennst du dich auch nur von einem der Splitter, verlierst du das Vertrauen deines Patrons.
languages.original_text: The shattered weapon clearly has a significant role to play in the future preordained by the Weaver of Destinies. To part with any of the shards would mean losing the trust of your patron.

traits.locale_text: Die geborstene Waffe spielt in der vom Weber der Schicksale vorherbestimmten Zukunft eindeutig eine bedeutende Rolle. Trennst du dich auch nur von einem der Splitter, verlierst du das Vertrauen deines Patrons.

languages.text: De toute évidence, l'arme brisée a un rôle crucial à jouer dans l'avenir tracé par le Tisseur de Destins. Vous séparer de ses fragments reviendrait à trahir la confiance de votre protecteur.
languages.original_text: The shattered weapon clearly has a significant role to play in the future preordained by the Weaver of Destinies. To part with any of the shards would mean losing the trust of your patron.

traits.locale_text: De toute évidence, l'arme brisée a un rôle crucial à jouer dans l'avenir tracé par le Tisseur de Destins. Vous séparer de ses fragments reviendrait à trahir la confiance de votre protecteur.

languages.text: El arma fragmentada tiene un papel esencial que desempeñar en el futuro prescrito por el Tejedor de Destinos. Separarse de cualquiera de los fragmentos acarrearía la pérdida de confianza de tu patrón.
languages.original_text: The shattered weapon clearly has a significant role to play in the future preordained by the Weaver of Destinies. To part with any of the shards would mean losing the trust of your patron.

traits.locale_text: El arma fragmentada tiene un papel esencial que desempeñar en el futuro prescrito por el Tejedor de Destinos. Separarse de cualquiera de los fragmentos acarrearía la pérdida de confianza de tu patrón.

languages.text: 很显然，在命运编织者预言的未来中，这把武器的碎片扮演着重要的角色。一旦失去任何一块碎片，都会导致彻底失去了庇护主的信任。
languages.original_text: The shattered weapon clearly has a significant role to play in the future preordained by the Weaver of Destinies. To part with any of the shards would mean losing the trust of your patron.

traits.locale_text: 很显然，在命运编织者预言的未来中，这把武器的碎片扮演着重要的角色。一旦失去任何一块碎片，都会导致彻底失去了庇护主的信任。

languages.text: 粉々になった武器は、どう考えても運命の操り手に定められた未来で重要な役割を果たす。破片を手放すことは、後ろ盾する者の信頼を失うことになるだろう。
languages.original_text: The shattered weapon clearly has a significant role to play in the future preordained by the Weaver of Destinies. To part with any of the shards would mean losing the trust of your patron.

traits.locale_text: 粉々になった武器は、どう考えても運命の操り手に定められた未来で重要な役割を果たす。破片を手放すことは、後ろ盾する者の信頼を失うことになるだろう。
